Label: IMPRESS Resources
Description: Anything that is used to support or help in the response during a health emergency

Label: Organizations
Description: The Organizations that take part at the response of an emergency event

Label: Stakeholders
Description: The stakeholders that are involved during a health emergency

Label: Human resources
Description: The personnel of agencies, units, departments etc. that take part during a response

Label: Full Protective Equipment
Description: The person is fully equiped and protected in this case

Label: Respiratory System Protection, Body Protection, Head, Eye, Ear Protection
Respiratory System Protection
Description: Self-contained breathing apparatus and Gas Mask with respirator (s)

Label: Body Protection
Description: Positive Pressure Personal Suit and Suit, gloves, boots

Label: Respiratory System Protection and Body Protection
Description: Self-contained breathing apparatus and Gas Mask with respirator (s)  + Positive Pressure Personal Suit and Suit, gloves, boots

Label: Respiratory System Protection and Head, Eye, Ear Protection
Description: Self-contained breathing apparatus and Gas Mask with respirator (s) + Helmet, Goggles and Visors

Label: Body Protection and Head, Eye, Ear Protection
Description: Positive Pressure Personal Suit and Suit, gloves, boots + Helmet, Goggles and Visors

Label: Medical Replacement Stockpile
Description: Includes any structural resources such as buildings, transportation etc.

Label: Health intervention points
Description: The health intervention points that can be offered as resource in order to respond to health emergencies

Label: Centers for Blood Transfusion and Transfusion Hematology
National Center for Radiological Defense Laboratories
National Center for Diseases Control and Prevention Laboratories
Regional Health Inspectorates
Description: The Regional Health Inspectorates can have in their structure also: Toxicological Laboratories, Microbiological Laboratories and Radiological Laboratories

Label: Vehicles
Description: Includes all vehicles that can be used during a health emergency
